entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Risk of a thundershower late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 90 late this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy with flurries beginning before morning. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
